00011 
00012 #ifndef SMUDEFS_H
00013 #define SMUDEFS_H
00014 
00015 /* include files */
00016 #include "aa/aaglobal.h"
00017 
00018 /*************
00019  *
00020  * Name:     Special States
00021  *
00022  * Purpose:  The definitions are used to signal the state machine
00023  *           to take special actions, instead of transitioning to
00024  *           another state
00025  *
00026  * Members:  stINVAL - Received event is invalid for this state - ABORT
00027  *           stIGNOR - Ignore event in this state
00028  *
00029  * Notes:
00030  *
00031  **************/
00032 #define stINVAL 0xFF
00033 #define stIGNOR 0xFE
00034 
00035 /*************
00036  *
00037  * Name:     smaction_t
00038  *
00039  * Purpose:  definition for action functions to be executed upon
00040  *           entering a state.  Used in the state action table.
00041  *
00042  * Notes:
00043  *
00044  **************/
00045 typedef void (*smaction_t)(void *pdata);
00046 
00047 /*************
00048  *
00049  * Name:    sm_t
00050  *
00051  * Purpose: State machine type.  Allows multiple state machines
00052  *          to be managed
00053  *
00054  * Members: state       - current state
00055  *          evnum       - number of possible events
00056  *          sat         - state action table
00057  *          stt         - state transition table
00058  *          stIgnore    - State machine value for the IGNORE state
00059  *          stInvld     - State machine value for the INVALID state
00060  *          udata       - user data, passed to action functions in the stt
00061  *
00062  * Notes:    Events MUST be numbered from 0 to evnum-1.  They are used
00063  *           to index into the state transition table
00064  *
00065  **************/
00066 typedef struct
00067 {
00068   swi_uint32    state;
00069   swi_uint8     evnum;
00070   smaction_t    *sat;
00071   swi_uint8     *stt;
00072   swi_uint8     stIgnore;
00073   swi_uint8     stInvld;
00074   void          *udata;
00075 }sm_t;
00076 
00077 /*
00078  * Package global entry point definitions - these come last
00079  */
00080 #include "smuproto.h"
00081 
00082 #endif /* SMUDEFS_H */
